potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) set your strength to 27'

potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) set your strength to 29'

potion_loot.name: potion of Climbing
potion_loot.description: (consumed, until long rest) gain climbing speed equal to your walking speedand advantage on Athletics checks you make to climb

potion_loot.name: potion of Animal Friendship
potion_loot.description: (consumed, until long rest) you can cast the spell animal friendship at will

potion_loot.name: oil of Slipperiness
potion_loot.description: (poured over creature (10m), 3h) creature gains advantage on grapples and the effect of a freedom of movement spell.

potion_loot.name: potion of Fire Breathing
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) your mouth emits the spell fire bolt as a bonus action or whenever you speak

potion_loot.name: potion of Frost
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) everything touched is affected by the spell frostbite. consumes a bonus action

potion_loot.name: potion of Heroism
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) gain 10 temporary hitpoints

potion_loot.name: potion of Speed
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) gain the effects of the haste spell

potion_loot.name: oil of Sharpness
potion_loot.description: (dipped, 1h) object gains +2 attack and damage rolls

potion_loot.name: oil of Killing
potion_loot.description: (dipped, 1h) object gains +3 attack and damage rolls

potion_loot.name: oil of Bleeding
potion_loot.description: (dipped, 1h) object gains +1 attack and damage rolls and causes targets to bleed for 1d4 every turn for 1d4 turns

potion_loot.name: potion of Mind Reading
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) you gain the effect of the detect thoughts spell'

potion_loot.name: Malice
potion_loot.description: (dipped/thrown, 1h) target must succeed on a DC 15 Con saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour, taking 2d4 damage per turn

potion_loot.name: Drow Poison
potion_loot.description: (dipped, 1h) object applies 1d6 poison damage on hit

potion_loot.name: poison of Assassin's Blood
potion_loot.description: (dipped, 1h) object applies 1d8 poison damage on hit'

potion_loot.name: potion of Invisibility
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) you become invisible

potion_loot.name: potion of Growth
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) gain the “enlarge” effect of the enlarge/reduce spell'

potion_loot.name: potion of Dimunition
potion_loot.description: (consumed, 1h) gain the “reduce” effect of the enlarge/reduce spell'

potion_loot.description: (consumed) restore 2d4+2 health

potion_loot.name: potion of Greater Healing
potion_loot.description: (consumed) restore 4d4+4 health

ammunition_loot.name: Hammerheads arrows

ammunition_loot.name: broadhead arrows

ammunition_loot.name: corkscrew arrows
ammunition_loot.description: (1d8 piercing) if your target is submerged, deals an additional 1d8 peircing (ammunition)

ammunition_loot.name: Rope arrows
ammunition_loot.description: (1d6 piercing) a 20m rope is attached to this arrow but your range is reduced by 10m due to the weight of a large rope (ammunition)

ammunition_loot.name: transport arrows
ammunition_loot.description: (1d6 piercing) you may teleport to this arrows location (ammunition)

ammunition_loot.name: splinter arrows
ammunition_loot.description: (1d6 piercing) this arrow will deal 1/3rd of its damage to up to two targets in 10m of the original (ammunition)

common_weapon.name: bone-carved dart

common_weapon.name: eagle's claw blade

common_weapon.name: dire pick
common_weapon.description: (1d8 piercing) +1 to hit and attacks rolls made against targets made of rock or mineral-like materials (light)

common_armor.name: fine sunning hat
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) while magelight affects an entity near you, your spell save DC has +1 (cloth hat)

common_armor.name: fine fur shirt
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) spells you cast that deal frost damage have an additional 1d4 damage (cloth shirt)

common_armor.name: fine cooking gloves
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) +1 damage to cantrips that deal fire damage (cloth gloves)

common_armor.name: fine silken pants
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) if you have no armor and less than 16 AC, you have +1 AC (cloth pants)

common_armor.name: fine shoes
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) after casting a cantrip, your move speed increases by 10m/s (cloth shoes)

common_armor.name: fine flowing shawl
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) after using a spell slot on a spell which generates water, you may cast a level one spell as a bonus action (still consumes a lvl 1 spell slot) (cloth cape)

common_armor.name: dark hood
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) while you are undetected, you have +1 to hit and deal an additional +1 piercing damage (cloth hat)

common_armor.name: dark robe
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) you gain a +1 to stealth, persuasion, and deception rolls (cloth shirt)

common_armor.name: dark deft-fingered gloves
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) you gain a +1 to lockpicking and pickpocket rolls. Once per long rest, you can pick a lock without consuming a lockpicking kit (cloth gloves)

common_armor.name: dark pants of the apologist
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) for 10m after being caught pickpocketing, you gain advantage on your deception rolls (cloth pants)

common_armor.name: dark shoes of tiptoeing
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) after succeeding a stealth check, your movement speed is increased by 10m (cloth shoes)

common_armor.name: dark cloak
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) made especially for swooping dramatically (cloth cape)

common_armor.name: leather helmet of the chooser
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) attacks made at greater than 30m have +1 to hit. attacks made at less than 10m have +1 to damage (light helmet)

common_armor.name: leather armor
common_armor.description: (req: 9 dex) AC is 11+dex modifier (light armor)

common_armor.name: scarred leather bracer
common_armor.description: (req: 9 dex) piercing damage attacks against you have disadvantage but bludgeoning damage attacks against you have advantage (light gloves)

common_armor.name: leather pants, byeshk buckle
common_armor.description: (req: 9 dex) +1 to dexterity but -1 to hit rolls made with ranged weapons (light pants)

common_armor.name: leather boots of biding
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) after ending your turn without moving, your next turn has +10m of movement speed (light boots)

common_armor.name: leather cape of the opportunist
common_armor.description: (req: 11 dex) your ranged weapons have +1 damage. your first attack per combat with a one-handed melee weapon has +2 damage (cape)

common_armor.name: padded helmet of chiding
common_armor.description: (req: 10 dex) while unarmed, you have +2 to your deception, persuasion, and performance rolls (light helmet)

common_armor.name: padded undershirt of confusion
common_armor.description: (req: 10 dex) this does not count as armor. your AC is 11 + your dex modifier (light armor)

common_armor.name: padded gloves
common_armor.description: (req: 9 dex) riposte: after a successful hit with a two-handed weapon, the next attack against you has -1 to hit (light gloves)

common_armor.name: bully's padded pants
common_armor.description: (req: 11 str) after knocking a target prone, you may expend a bonus action to attack the target (without rolling to hit)for 1/2 the rolled damage (light pants)

common_armor.name: Happy Foot's padded shoes
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) in combat, after moving at least 10m on a turn, your AC is increased by 1 until your next turn (light boots)

common_armor.name: padded cape
common_armor.description: (req: 12 dex) you have +1 to all strength rolls (cape)

common_armor.name: hide cap of sparring
common_armor.description: (req: 11 dex) after making a successful hit roll, your AC is increased by 1 until a successful hit against you. does not stack (medium helmet)

common_armor.name: hide tunic
common_armor.description: (req: 11 dex) AC is 15+dex modifier (medium armor)

common_armor.name: hide gloves
common_armor.description: (req: 12 dex) once per combat, your first hit with a two-handed weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage (medium gloves)

common_armor.name: hide pants of the duelist
common_armor.description: (req: 11 dex) once per long rest, you may reduce incoming melee slashing damage by half as a reaction (medium pants)

common_armor.name: hide footwraps
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) you have +5m of movement speed (medium shoes)

common_armor.name: hide cape
common_armor.description: (req: N/A) after a humanoid misses you with an attack, their hit roll is reduced by 1, up to 2 (cape

rare_weapon.name: soarwood glaive
rare_weapon.description: (1d6+1 piercing) this weapons impeccable aerodynamics grants you +10m movement speed while wielding it (heavy, reach, two-handed)

rare_weapon.name: soarwood greataxe
rare_weapon.description: (1d12 slashing) if you roll 2 or less on a damage roll you can re-roll the die and choose which one to apply (heavy, two-handed)

rare_weapon.name: soarwood halberd
rare_weapon.description: (1d10 slashing) if you roll 2 or less on a damage roll you can re-roll the die and choose which one to apply (heavy, reach, two-handed)

rare_weapon.name: steel lance
rare_weapon.description: (1d10+1 piercing) deals +5 damage if you are somehow on a horse or other bovine mount (reach, special)

rare_weapon.name: hardened blue ice longsword
rare_weapon.description: (1d8 slashing) +1d4 frost damage (versatile)

rare_weapon.name: aurorum maul
rare_weapon.description: (2d6 bludgeoning) +1d4 holy damage. against undead, successful hits deal an additional 2d4 (Heavy, two-handed )

rare_weapon.name: aurorum morningstar
rare_weapon.description: (1d8 piercing) +1d4 holy damage. when you deal damage to an undead, deal 1d4 additional damage to undead within 5m (--)

rare_weapon.name: aurorum pike
rare_weapon.description: (1d10 piercing) +1d4 holy damage. when hitting undead, roll a d20. rolls over 15 turn the undead for 1d4 turns (Heavy, reach, two-handed )

rare_weapon.name: pandemonic silver rapier
rare_weapon.description: (1d10 piercing) counts as silver. when swung, emits a scream that requires a DC12 wisdom saving throw. DC15 in high strength winds (finesse)

rare_weapon.name: pandemonic silver scimitar
rare_weapon.description: (1d8 slashing) counts as silver. when swung, emits a scream that requires a DC12 wisdom saving throw. DC15 in high strength winds (finesse, light)

rare_weapon.name: pandemonic silver shortsword
rare_weapon.description: (1d6 piercing) counts as silver. when swung, emits a scream that requires a DC12 wisdom saving throw. DC15 in high strength winds (finesse, light)

rare_weapon.name: thinaun trident
rare_weapon.description: (1d6+1 piercing) +1 necrotic damage. sucks up the soul of slain creatures, preventing them from being raised (thrown, versatile)

rare_weapon.name: thinaun war pick
rare_weapon.description: (1d8+1 piercing) +1 necrotic damage. sucks up the soul of slain creatures, preventing them from being raised (--)

rare_weapon.name: blue ice warhammer
rare_weapon.description: (1d8 bludgeoning) +1d6 frost damage (versatile)

rare_weapon.name: darkweave whip
rare_weapon.description: (1d4 slashing) +1d4 necrotic damage (finesse, reach)

rare_weapon.name: densewood blowgun
rare_weapon.description: (1+2 piercing) +1d4 necrotic damage (ammunition)

rare_weapon.name: serrated darkweave net
rare_weapon.description: (1d4 slashing) enemies must succeed a DC15 dex saving throw to escape. if they fail, they take an additional 1d4 slashing every turn until the DC is met (thrown, special)

rare_weapon.name: fire arrows
rare_weapon.description: (1d6 piercing) +1d4 fire damage and ignites flammable materials. (ammunition)

rare_weapon.name: blinding arrows
rare_weapon.description: (1d6 bludgeoning) this arrow has a small clay head containing a reactive chemical. On hit, the chemical releases a bright flash, blinding the target until the start of your next turn (ammunition)

rare_weapon.name: smoking arrows
rare_weapon.description: (1d6 bludgeoning) this arrow has a small clay head containing a reactive chemical. On hit, the chemical releases smoke in a 10ft sphere, heavily obscuring vision in that area for 10 rounds (ammunition)

rare_weapon.name: poisoncloud arrows
rare_weapon.description: (1d6 bludgeoning) this arrow has a small clay head containing a reactive chemical. On hit, the chemical releases pale fog in a 10ft sphere, dealing 1d6 damage to all living things within for 5 rounds. lightly obscures vision (ammunition)

rare_armor.name: cat-eared graceful hat
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) You gain Cat's Grace and increase your Dexterity score by 2, to a maximum 20. (cloth hat}'

rare_armor.name: graceful shirt
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) 10AC+dex. Whenever the wearer succeeds a Saving Throw against a spell, they regain 1d6hp. (cloth shirt}'

rare_armor.name: graceful gloves of the comedian
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) once per long rest, you may cast the spell Hideous Laughter (cloth gloves}'

rare_armor.name: graceful pants of the curious
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) you gain +2 to investigation checks (cloth pants)

rare_armor.name: graceful shoes
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) if the wearer is standing in a water surface at the start of their turn, they heal 1d4hp (cloth shoes}'

rare_armor.name: reflective graceful shawl
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) once per long rest, you may cast the spell Color Spray (cloth cape}'

rare_armor.name: adamant adamantine studded cap
rare_armor.description: (req: dex 11) if you've taken no damage from non-magical attacks this fight, you have +2 damage with ranged weapons (light helm)

rare_armor.name: adamantine studded harness
rare_armor.description: (req: dex 12) your AC is 12+dex modifier (light armor)

rare_armor.name: librarian's adamantine studded gloves
rare_armor.description: (req: dex 11) you gain advantage on history checks (light gloves)

rare_armor.name: adamantine studded chaps
rare_armor.description: (req: dex 11) your movement speed when prone is 20m per turn your MS while crouched is 25m per turn (light pants)

rare_armor.name: adamantine studded boots
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) you gain resistance to poison damage (boots)

rare_armor.name: adamantine studded cloak
rare_armor.description: (req: N/A) you gain +1 to stealth checks when out of combat and +1 to deception checks (cape)

rare_armor.name: cold-iron chain cap
rare_armor.description: (req: str 13) you are resistant to ice damage. when a melee attack against you fails, gain a stack of 'cold snap'(max 2)for 2 rounds(12s) (heavy helm)

rare_armor.name: cold-iron chainmail
rare_armor.description: (req: str 13) 16AC. your max 'cold snap' stacks increases to 3 (heavy chestplate)

rare_armor.name: cold-iron chain cuffs
rare_armor.description: (req: str 13) you gain +2 to hit when wielding only a one-handed weapon (heavy gloves)

rare_armor.name: cold-iron chainpants
rare_armor.description: (req: str 13) +1 to survival rolls. when struck with a non-magical attack, you deal 1d4 frost damage to the attacker and 1 frost damage to enemies within 2m of you, per stack of 'cold snap' (heavy pants)

rare_armor.name: cold-iron chain boots
rare_armor.description: (req: str 13) you have advantage against acrobatics checks for slippery surfaces. you gain +5m of movement speed per 2 pieces of cold-iron armor you have equipped (heavy boots)

rare_armor.name: cold-iron chain gorget
rare_armor.description: (req: str 13) while you have 2 or more stacks of 'cold snap', your AC is increased by 1 (max 19) (heavy cape)
